sample.title: Text Steganography with Capital Letters
sample.summary: Hide and extract a message in and from another text
sample.description: This is a text steganography technique where a secret message is hidden by changing the letters of the message in the cover text to uppercase.

replacement.value: He ordered his regular breakfast. Two eggs sunnyside up, hash browns, and two strips of bacon. He continued to look at the menu wondering if this would be the day he added something new. This was also part of the routine. A few seconds of hesitation to see if something else would be added to the order before demuring and saying that would be all. It was the same exact meal that he had ordered every day for the past two years.

This mode of text steganography converts all the letters of the cover text to lowercase letters and then converts only the letters of the secret message to uppercase. In order to hide the whole message correctly, the cover text should contain all the letters of the secret message in the same order distributed within a longer text.

sample.title: Text-Steganografie mit Großbuchstaben
sample.summary: Geheime Nachrichten in einem Text verstecken und wieder extrahieren
sample.description: Das ist eine Text-Steganografie Technik, wo eine geheime Nachricht in einem Text versteckt wird indem die Buchstaben der geheimen Nachricht im Covertext großgeschrieben werden.

replacement.value: He ordered his regular breakfast. Two eggs sunnyside up, hash browns, and two strips of bacon. He continued to look at the menu wondering if this would be the day he added something new. This was also part of the routine. A few seconds of hesitation to see if something else would be added to the order before demuring and saying that would be all. It was the same exact meal that he had ordered every day for the past two years.

Dieser Modus der Textsteganographie konvertiert alle Buchstaben des Covertexts in Kleinbuchstaben und konvertiert dann nur die Buchstaben der geheimen Nachricht in Großbuchstaben. Um die gesamte Nachricht korrekt auszublenden, sollte der Covertext alle Buchstaben und Zeichen der geheimen Nachricht sortiert und verteilt enthalten.
